profile:
Singular Focus:

Most landscape and renovation companies try to serve many types of customers at the same time; homeowners, shopping centers, office buildings, golf courses, and the list goes on. They are pulled in all directions trying to be everything to everyone. At Captain Handy Co, we focus on one customer, you, the homeowner. We have a singular focus on bringing you the best landscaping and interior renovation, the best customer service, and the best value for your home. When you consider that quality renovation can improve the value of your home by 10%-15%, why wouldn’t you hire the one company that focuses specifically on residential landscaping? We are Your Residential Landscape and interior renovation Company.
Easy:

Our business makes your life easier. We are committed to improving the quality of life for our customers so they can spend their time on other things. Our customers are busy and have hectic lives. They do not have time to deal with different companies for lawn care, mowing, design, patio building. Captain Handy Co. offers turn-key solutions to your landscape needs. One call connects you with one of our very qualified Landscape Advisors who will make sure that you are delighted with your landscape. It is that easy.
Hassle-Free:

Ever notice how some companies make it a hassle just to do business with them? Who needs hassles? Life is complicated enough as it is. With Captain Handy Co, you can expect fast response times, clear and concise proposals, and work to be done how and when we promise it would be. You can also expect us to stand behind our work, show up when we say we will and take care of the little things that can take a landscape,renovation and experience, from blah to wow! We take away the hassles so all you have to do is enjoy your landscape.
Professional:

With 5 years under our belts, we know a thing or two about being the professional contractor of choice. Our staff has an average tenure rate of over twelve years, and some team members have been with us for over two decades! They undergo extensive and on-going training to not only assure that your renovation looks fantastic, but also to make sure that you are treated superbly. Our staff members are clearly recognizable in their sharp uniforms so you will know who is on your property. With so many companies claiming to be “professional”, isn’t it nice to work with a company that actually is?
Our Values:

At Captain Handy Co, we provide Tender Loving Care to both you and your interior and landscape renovation. These are our Values:
•	Treat people honestly, fairly and with respect in all situations
•	Create a comfortable environment in which to work and do business
•	Be open to problems and complaints, and work quickly to a fair resolution
•	Present a professional image and working safely
•	Have a “can-do” attitude
•	Stand behind our commitment to quality and service
•	Be active, responsible and positive citizens in the communities in which we work

profile: ROYAL Decks Co. is a custom decking company priding itself in high quality of work and complete customer satisfaction. ROYAL Decks Co. focuses on specialty materials, such as exotic hardwoods, low maintenance materials and high grades of cedar. ROYAL Decks Co. offers a complete solution for a homeowner from custom designs to the execution of the project. ROYAL Decks Co. was founded in Burlington Ontario and quickly grew to serve all surrounding areas of Toronto and also Calgary since 2008 onwards. We are successful because we take every deck builder project as if it was the only one, although we build hundreds each year. Our success is based on the following five core values: Great design Quality work Build on time and budget Provide great warranty Safety Great design In order for the deck to be great, it has to be usable, look great and fulfill all of the customer's expectations. With our extensive experience, we will work with you to design the deck that will serve the purpose, according to your needs. This means getting the right size and shape of the deck, getting the right features and selecting the right materials. We work with many materials of different properties and we are sure to find one that will work for you. Build quality We have only the most experienced carpenters. Our carpenters have been in construction most of their lives and they build decks not because they have to, but because they love it. All of our decks have to meet very strict ROYAL Decks Co. quality control on top of any building code requirements. Our decks not only meet building code, they exceed it. Build on time and on budget Our estimate includes time frame when the project will be started, how long it will take and how much exactly it will cost. We strive to make the construction process an enjoyable experience. That is why we take these extra seriously. Provide great warranty We are proud to give one of the best warranties in the business to every deck that carries ROYAL Decks Co. name on it. We stand behind the work that we do. To see details about our warranty please visit our warranty website. Safety Safety is our utter most requirement doing any work. We carry both WCB and WSIB, to date without a single claim. We keep our workplace neat and organized to minimize any injuries. Sincerely, Miro

Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. is a privately owned company with over 15 years of experience in the Interlocking and Landscaping industry.  Based out of Milton, Ontario, we are happy to service the West GTA.

Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. is a full-service luxury landscape company with staff that are trained in up to date industry leading practices.  We onboard our teams to instil our company’s expectations of excellence.  The staff go through weekly training sessions to ensure our sales representatives, office admin and skilled labourers have an in depth understanding of their responsibilities to you, the customer.

At Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. we are truly committed to our customers throughout the entire job process.  We take all necessary steps to ensure an enjoyable experience from beginning to end.  We pride ourselves in our dedication to offering the best solution for your driveway, patio and front entrance and in maintaining a premium level of customer service. 

At Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. we have 2 core values; our Customers and the Environment. Not only do we offer the best quality products and services, we are also committed to minimizing our carbon footprint.  We are proud to be the front runners in taking an environmentally friendly approach to a very polluted industry. 

Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. is fully licensed, bonded and insured.  We are equipped with Worker’s Compensation (WSIB) and a $2,000,000 liability insurance policy protecting your personal assets.   Our work is protected by a written two year workmanship warranty that covers all aspects of the project.  All of the products we use are covered by a lifetime guarantee through Canadian based manufacturers.

At Enviro-Loc Interlocking Ltd. we are aiming to innovate the interlocking industry.  We are committed to lead our industry towards a future that is not only cleaner, but is also more environmentally responsible. We take pride in building a better tomorrow for future generations.

profile:
Winner of many awards including a national and provincial award for best residential design. With passion and creativity and over twenty years' experience in beautifying properties all over the GTA, Land-Con prides itself on customer satisfaction and customer experience before, during and after the project is completed. We are very honest with our customers, keeping them up to date regularly with the progress of the project. We strive to give our customers the highest quality of work, starting with our very experienced in house, award winning landscape designers, as well as extremely professional and respectable trade personal on the job site, with the owners them selves over seeing every single project on a daily basis.
We have received industry wide recognition for design and build, professionalism and customer satisfaction.


ACCOMPLISHED TEAM
Active Member of Landscape Ontario and Bild.  ICPI and NCMA certified.  Techno-Bloc Pro installer.  Permacon Pro installer.  2016 Winner of 2 Landscape Awards of Excellence, 2017 winner of 3 landscape awards of excellence, 2019 National Award, 2020 Winner of 3 landscape awards of excellence and the Van Casey award for best Design. 
At Land-Con, our principles, passion and reputation speak for themselves.  Our valued clients will agree; excellence in project management, coupled with our highly qualified management and crew are second to none.


COMPASSIONATE CARE
We build to capture and reflect the unique vision our clients trust us to create while abiding to strict standards and timelines.  We value your expectations and opinion and respect the importance of budget guidelines.  The job site will always be left cleaned up and tidy and ready for next day construction.  We respect your property and will be courteous and considerate of you and your neighbors.


AFTER CARE
At Land-con we believe that after a project is completed the aftercare with our customers is just as important as any part of the project.  If at any time after the project is completed, you have any questions or concerns we are here to help.  We back our workmanship with a five year extended warranty.  This warranty is transferable if you happen to sell your home within the five year period.  Our top priority is customer service.  We take pride in providing courteous prompt responses to all clients past and current.

ABOUT THE OWNERS

Growing up together for the past 30 years, Ofer Winkler and Jeremy Lerner have formed a strong friendship which naturally became a great partnership.  They have both been in the landscape industry since 1997 giving each of them over 20 years experience in this industry.  Each one brings to the table their specialized onsite experience, and combined with their in class courses that they have attended over the years, makes them a team like no other.  Ofer and Jeremy have a passion for the landscape industry and each project they built over the years, which gives each home owner their own unique experience.  Their mission and vision is to give every home owner and project they build the attention and time they deserve.  This has made Land-Con a well-respected company by home owners, suppliers and even competitors around the GTA.  Together, they are an award winning team that transforms their clients' vision into reality, while providing professional services that meet the budget and time line.

profile:
Outdoor Lighting Perspectives is the world's largest full-service outdoor lighting company, and we are proud to have our fixtures enjoyed at more than 150,000+ homes across North America. 

Whatever your outdoor lighting needs, we have the experience and expertise to get it done right the first time.

WHAT WE DO:

We want to transform your outdoor living spaces in the best way possible. Some of our exquisite outdoor lighting options include:

-Accent lighting to subtly show off your property’s best features
-Architectural lighting to highlight your home’s unique beauty
-Pool lighting to keep your nightly swims safe
-Patio and deck lights to add excitement to your nighttime entertaining
-Garden lighting to accentuate your stunning landscaping
-Path lighting to guide your guests where they need to go
-Up-lighting for home facade, trees, and outdoor artwork

From a single small garden that needs just a touch of light, to a sprawling estate home that needs lighting with zone control automation, we offer it all.

Call us today for a free at-home consultation, and one of our lighting designers will make a customs lighting design for your unique property.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT:

We are dedicated outdoor lighting designers and installers. We do one thing, and we do it the best. We aren't a sprinkler company or lawn care company moonlighting in outdoor lights when times are slow. We will be here to take the call when your lights need maintenance years down the road.

We manufacture our lights by hand, mostly in the United States but some right here in Toronto, so we can control the entire chain of quality from raw materials to your beautiful garden. 

Our designers, installers, and service crews are all our own staff: we do not use sub-contractors. With Outdoor Lighting Perspectives, your satisfaction is guaranteed in writing and backed by our 30 year on-site warranty.

THE TRUSTWORTHY CHOICE:

How can you find an outdoor lighting contractor you can trust to get the work done right, on time, and safely? 

We have been independently vetted by a third-party for our complete and up-to-date liability insurance and workers compensation coverage, our safety and training compliance, and our long established track record of happy customer referrals and testimonials. 

Companies claiming to do lighting come and go, but we're celebrating 20 years and our warranty is backed by our international network of 60+ locations. We'll install your lights today, but we'll also maintain them for years to come.

THE NEXT STEP:

We offer free design consultations and free quotes. Please contact us to discuss your outdoor lighting needs and how we can be of assistance.

Rotary Sprinkler Rotor-type sprinklers have one or more moving streams of water that rotate around the sprinkler head.

Valves Electric solenoid valves used for turning on irrigation circuits (sprinklers or drip emitters.) Includes anti-siphon, angle, and globe type valves.
Controllers Controllers are fancy timers used to turn on and off automatic valves.

Our synthetic grass eliminates the need for constant maintenance such as irrigation, mowing, fertilizing, aerating and more.

Fieldmasters products are durable, versatile, safe, economical and 100% recyclable.
